core
Class MapPanel

java.lang.Object
  java.awt.Component
      java.awt.Container
          javax.swing.JComponent
              javax.swing.JPanel
                  core.MapPanel
All Implemented Interfaces:
java.awt.image.ImageObserver, java.awt.MenuContainer, java.io.Serializable, javax.accessibility.Accessible
public class MapPanel
extends javax.swing.JPanel

This panel holds all of the MapTiles which can be drawn to. It displays the map that is currently being drawn on.

See Also:
Serialized Form
